entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. 60 percent chance of flurries over northern sections near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
